thread.title: Why Homemade Bombs Are Easy to Make and Hard to Trace

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Why Homemade Bombs Are Easy to Make and Hard to Trace
text:
It has been 40 years since Theodore Kaczynski, known as the Unabomber, began terrorizing the country by mailing homemade explosives fashioned with metal pipes, wood and nails. But even now, bomb making still remains incredibly simple, experts say.
Police in Austin have said they believe the blasts that have shaken the city this month are linked precisely because of how the devices were constructed.
While...
